IF, however you intend to use the daisy chain feature and link multiple speakers together then I would think twice before buying this one. For some odd reason, the sound quality diminishes noticeably when you link it to another JBL speaker. I found that this only occurs when you are playing music through a bluetooth connection. If you connect the speaker directly to your phone then it sounds fine. It's moderately irritating because it's such obvious oversight that should have been fixed before production. Otherwise, it's a great product and I do plan to keep it.
Easy to use and carry, compact design with great sound.  What more do I need to say?  It's a terrific little speaker!!
A little pricey but decent sound for how small they are. I bought two of these and daisy chained them together. It definitely makes a difference.

I really just wanted something I could use in the bathroom, and I'm quite happy with the purchase! The volume gets plenty loud for even a large bathroom and you can choose whether to utilize the bluetooth or just plug into the audio jack on your device. I required the bluetooth because I work in relatively remote locations and I often have to place my phone in specific locations outside of the bathroom to receive data. So far I have tested the bluetooth to at least 50' with no issues whatsoever.The battery tends to last somewhere in the realm of 8 hours or so at 50-75% volume for most of its use which is perfectly acceptable.My only negative comment is the bluetooth only can remember one device at a time, so if my fiance used it last I have to re-pair my phone to it. It's not enough to knock off a star, but it's close.I would purchase again!
Sound is great for size but takes to long to connect to bluetooth. I tied connecting to iPhone and iPad at different times but wouldn't connect.

This is my first review. I always shop by filtering by reviews first. When this came up in the top range for portable iPhone speakers I decided to take a chance on it since it was both a portable speaker and a Bluetooth receiver. This was a bit of a hard choice since it is still about $10 more than other highly rated portable speakers and highly rated Bluetooth receivers combined. However, knowing JBLs high reputation for speakers I decided to take the plunge and purchase this product. I have zero regrets! This thing sounds awesome even maxed out on volume on both my phone and speaker. It easily fills my 800 sq home. Don't get me wrong it doesn't supplement speakers for a house. I am just saying it sounds clear throughout the house. I can even hook it up to my computer speakers and transmit songs from the iPhone or ipad. This is great for parties since you can simply pass around your iPhone or ipad for guests to control the music. I have heard other speakers that are this size and range, while they sound pretty good, they just don't compare. Take a chance and get it. You won't regret it.
summary: Amazing bang for you buck, great speaker and Bluetooth receiver

reviewText: I love this little wireless speaker! The sound is impressive for such a small sized speaker, and the portability makes it so convenient to use. I took the advice of another reviewer and got a carabiner to hang it from my belt or pocket, and I like it much better than using earphones that just fall out of my ears whenever I move around... The instructions provided are pretty minimal, but you can figure it out pretty easily. It can only be paired with one device at a time obviously, so since I like to use it with the laptop, the iPad and the iPhone I have to monkey around a bit when switching devices, but it's not a big deal. All in all, a great little speaker.
Wonderful Sound Crisp & Clear - Excellent product especially for the price. The set up instructions leave a little to be desired but once you have the speaker linked - sit back and enjoy!
summary: JBL Micro Wireless - Worth Every Penny

reviewText: I do a lot of training in rooms where I have to rent sound.  I talk loud enough that I don't need a microphone, but sometimes I want to play something off my computer and my laptop speakers aren't loud enough.  I love this speaker because it's bluetooth AND wired, so I can connect it to my laptop.  I've used this in training sessions with up to 75 people in one room and the sound is excellent.  We also used this when traveling to play off our iPods/phones.  It's small enough to travel easily but has big sound.

I first saw the JBL Micro Wireless Bluetooth Speaker on the Today Show.  I thought, for a small speaker it has great sound so I decided to order it.  I am very pleased with the sound of the speaker and the ability to charge it using an USB port is great, no batteries.  Also, I have an old Ipod.  I was able to connect it to the speaker.  My 12 year old grandson thinks the speaker is awesome too.
A lot of sound in a small package. Like that my girlfriend can stick it in her purse without taking my up much room. Paid $55 which is a little high and why I rated 4 instead of 5
summary: Big sound in a small package!

reviewText: This was it! Very nice to have a Bluetooth connection without wires, very good sound! Looks good and easy to carry with.
summary: Great sound - small package - love the bluetooth connection!

reviewText: My picky college freshman initially wanted the $200. Type mini speaker but I read many reviews about this speaker so I purchased it. She ignored this speaker for several days UNTIL returning to school. She discovered this small wonder was easy to sync and projected clear sound. She even said "mom I heard my music down the hall from my room!"  Thumbs up!

Great sound and great portability from this little speaker. I really like the fact that it has Bluetooth and a cable so you can connect to devices that don't have Bluetooth, too. It has a built in rechargeable battery that gives you several hours of listening pleasure and the sound is amazing from such a small speaker. I pop into my backpack because it takes so little room and use it when I travel. Great sound on the move or just at your desk.

This product was much better than I thought it would be.  I have been using it for a couple of weeks, and I have been blown away.- The sound quality is simply great.  It fills a room if you needed it to (great for a multimedia presentation on the fly)- The recharging USB works like a charm, but you need your own source to plug it into (no AC adapter) - this isn't an issue for me- The battery life seems to be great, I have not run it long enough to have had an issue so far- I particularly like the flat bottom so I can stick it on a shelf and not have to worry about it falling over- the manual volume adjustment is also something I like.  You of course can still use your devise to control from the source, but this allows you to make sure your max volume level doesn't get too loud.I really like this product!

Loved this! For a small purse size speaker, this has a big sound.  Of course it works better indoors but I've taken it to the beach a couple of times and it works great in the wideopen space for a personal speaker!!  I would buy it again...

The sound quality is pretty good from such a small device, and the manual volume control is way more convenient than volume up and down buttons.  The speaker connected flawlessly to my Samsung Galaxy Mega 5.8, and has a range of about 15 or 20 feet.  The charging light stopped working after about three months, but the speaker still charged and worked perfectly other than the charging indicator light.  JBL's excellent customer service had it replaced within one week of me returning it.  The return process was VERY easy.
summary: Charging light broke after three months, but JBL replaced it very quickly.

reviewText: Easily pairs with my Samsung smartphone. Impressive sound, solid construction, nice design. My wife commented recently, I can't hear anything with this tiny boombox blasting me.

Great little speaker for personal listening, but definitely not for use with singing groups. I failed to notice the video and pics that indicated the true small size of this speaker. I thought it was at least twice its actual size and assumed it would put out enough volume to use with a small children's choir. Not sure this will be the case. Most of the pictures do not show its actual size because there is nothing in the frame to indicate actual scale or size.  Will try it tonight, then update this review.
I purchased this dandy little speaker as an adjunct to my IPad. Wow! Great sound, extremely easy to set up Bluetooth and was exactly what I was looking for! Nice compact size and great sound!
I've read other reviews of these speakers but it was hard to believe. The sound that comes from this speaker is amazing. It's a good buy. The blue-tooth locks with my iPad no problem.

this is my third bluetooth speaker. if you are looking for a bluetooth that you can carry around with good sound, this is it and you wont regret, sound is very good for its size, but if you are looking for a bigger one that you dont want to carry with good sound and good price buy the CREATIVE D100 bass is awesome.... i love JBL speakers. you wont regret buying this.

very portable, very good sound, easily pairs with all bluetooth devices that I've used it with.  Besides the great sound - the built-in aux wire and it's ability to be daisy chained with other speakers really help this speaker stand out against it's competitors.The little handle/hook is an amazing addition as well for hanging this during certain situations.  Fits great on a towel/door hook, providing a great soundtrack to the morning shower!!I own a few different competing units, including the jambox and Sharkk - and I still find myself using this unit above all the others.
summary: Head of the Pack Portable Speaker

reviewText: I ordered this for my daughter for Christmas.For a little speaker, this one sounds big. Will definitely recomend to friends.
No need to go too much into detail. Just Buy it, little bit pricey but definitely worth the money. Wise Investment. Not too loud as I was expecting but loud enough.

I was initially surprised at the size when I received it.  I thought I had gotten ripped off due to the size THEN I turned it on..... Outstanding sound and volume capability!  It is heavy for its size which makes me think it is well made.  The sound clarity it great,even at higher volume.  I use it all the time with my pandora on my phone.  The battery life is impressive as well.  I am going to purchase more of these for sure.

This is a GREAT little bluetooth speaker.  Beyond just being a very good small speaker, it's also works as a bridge to add bluetooth to any other speaker that has an audio-in port.  Well designed and well built.

The sound coming from this little wonder is amazing no matter what's your music of choice.  Perfectly fine and balanced bass and treble make this speaker the best choice over any other bluetooth speaker I've tested or owned.  Battery life goes way beyond advertised and charges very quick.  Overall,  a very good portable design and implementation. . Would buy again and again!

This speaker is not what reviews are making it out to be.First: it is very inconsistent in its connection. Sometimes it pairs right up, other-times I have to restart it / my device several times. I have a $12.00 bluetooth adapter that works every-time without hiccup. Not impossible to accomplish.Second: Either I have a defective unit or whoever said this has "NO hissing or buzzing" must be deaf. Its completely obvious and persist through the full range of amplification.Third: Power button, hanger and volume wheel are poorly placed. If you want to clip this, the clip should rotate or be placed 90 degrees perpendicular to itself. The power button is easily triggered during travel in a pocket or bag. In fact, practically every time I pull this out of my pocket the power is on and the volume is not where I left it.The sound quality is okay. As for myself I'm returning this and coughing up the extra $40 - $50 for a premium unit. This is just an overpriced, overhyped cheap bluetooth speaker.
summary: Don't mean to burst your bubble...

reviewText: It is no louder than our I pad. Very disappointed. Thought it would enhance the iPad speakers. Should have gotten the next step up
It works as advertised and the sound it great. Just what I was looking for.  The size is great also.
5/14/2014Does not work with iphone 4sBroken ?What do I do with it > do I send it back & Where ?

I'm so glad I read the customer reviews before purchasing this speaker.  The sound is much better than I thought and well worth the cost.  You won't be disappointed! I almost purchased the speaker recommended by Consumer Reports magazine (can't remember the brand, see mag dated July 2013), but once I reviewed the customer reviews in Amazon, I was disappointed to see it didn't fair well. JBL is the way to go, no doubt. ;)

I did some research and this speaker was generally rated to be among the best for the money.  Crystal clear sound with relatively deep bass.  Love the simplicity in syncing and the ability to use the 3.5mm jack.  It seems that if you have multiple speaker that you can even link them together for even more sound.  I could not ask more for the price.  I'm very happy with my purchase.  I highly recommend this for anyone who would like a loud speaker instead of headphones!

I had been wanting a wireless speaker for some time, and I finally bit the bullet ahead of a beach vacation. This thing is fantastic; a great value. It's plenty loud enough, and the ability to hang from anywhere only enhances the acoustics.
summary: Best purchase of the last 10 years

reviewText: My son turned me on to this little speaker and I love it.  I use it in the car along with my cell phone and sometimes Google Maps on my cell phone.  The size is perfect even to carry while you are out walking.  Sound is great
I think mine was defective.  Slight distortion (no I didm't
Good sound quality but quite unstable bluetooth connection. I would have preferred a WIFI connection rather than a weak bluetooth.
Good purchase.  Nice sound quality, very portable, good battery time. Passed it down to my son and upgraded.  Lol  He kept using it when I wasnt around.

Finally got an iPhone and started downloading some music-- then I wanted a bit better sound than I got from the phone, so I looked at wireless speakers and realized they were within price range. I got this one in red, it had a good name and was cute and small-- I am not a techie or a musician, so I like a decent sound, but it does not have to be great. Maybe this one does produce excellent sound, I just would not know. What it does do, par excellence, is travel around the house (and on trips, etc) with me and provide good sound at a reasonable level-- no having to blast away so I can hear it as a wander from room to room and floor to floor. You actually could hook it to a belt or whatever. Very good purchase!
summary: Portable, nice sound, and cute, too!

reviewText: It is beautiful and durable. I really love it!It not only has a Bluetooth that allow me to connect it with my cell phone, but also a wire that can connect with my other devices!!

I've tried many Bluetooth speakers to include the JBL flip. HMDX Jam, Veho VSS-006-360BT, Jambox, Big Jambox, Jabra solemate, Philips ShoqBox, Logitech UE Boombox, Zimri mini Bluetooth, and creative D80. The JBL speakers are the best sounding in my opinion. They have the best frequency range and accuracy. The micro sound quality is compared to the flip is a little thin and has less bass output. Still it's about 7-8 tenths of the sound quality and it's loud enough for a small gathering. Bluetooth range is about 35' and easy to pair. It's well built and has a nice simple classy design. The on off tone is not annoying and the LED is not annoyingly bright like so many other speakers. My only complaint is that it has a mechanical volume that can over time start to crackle and cut out. For $59.95 it should have electronic volume. Even with that issue I think it's priced fair.

I ordered this for my son for his birthday.  It is such a wonderful crisp clear sound that I am ordering one for myself.  I actually thought he hooked up his computer to the sounds system when in fact it was this little gadget.

You are paying the brand here, you can find much better and less expensive portable speakers from unknown brands in amazon. Don't buy !! A friend of mine have one of those mini speakers and it sound almost the same, its only different and it costs a fraction of this one. If it comes to sound quality this is just like any other portable speaker. Poor bass, to bright highs, not a great improvement over the stock ipad or any other mobile device sound. Definitely not worth the money. Go for the cheaper ones, you will get the same sound.
summary: Expensive for what it is - Bad Sound

reviewText: This was a gift and I am amazed at the quality of the sound.  The capability of blue tooth enables me to use it anywhere.  I purchased this one for my grandson since he loved mine.

Bought this for my Kids B'Day early January, (wanted her to get rid of the fire hazard boom box plugged in her bathroom)we charged it immediately upon opening, She tells me she has never had to charge it since and it is still going strong, and yes believe me she uses it everyday !.I am an audiophile, and have some very high end equipment, would I place this in "reference" category sound,... of course not.But really great clear sound for what it is.would like to see a built in microphone for phone calls,Skype, etc,  like on another JBL bluetooth portable, but maybe I'm asking too much.5 stars for compact quality, & battery life.
The sound is very good and the quality is excellent.  Easily connects via Bluetooth .Sound level can be adjusted by a sliding switch on the side of the unit.
But fantastic, best I've heard out of a small speaker. I would recommend it especially if you listen to an iPhone without headphones.
Best compact speaker you can buy. I have spent over 100 dollars on ihome but this speaker is louder and better .  It's an eye catcher.
summary: super loud , even though its compact its soo loud

reviewText: I bought this to compensate for the weak speakers that came on my 11" laptop. It does the job.You can use the bluetooth or plug it into a device.I can also use it with my iPod.

I bought this so I'd have some tunes to keep me company while I'm working in the garage or on my old boat. I'm streaming Pandora on my Windows phone to this speaker. The speaker is much smaller than I expected it to be but the sound is really decent for such a small package. The sound is not the most amazing thing to ever hit my ears but for the price and the small, very portable package I think this is a good deal. It easily goes for 6 or 7 hours without needing a charge. Not sure how long it could play if I just left it on without recharging for a longer period.
God sound excellent buy.

Powerful little speaker that worked great out of the box, then abruptly no sound coming from it. Quickly returned it and thanks to Amazon's great customer service. Still looking for a wireless speaker for my MAC .
Great sound for its size. Easy to carry. No no-signal background noise like another unit I have. Fits most anywhere.
I will keep it short. Awesome size, phenonemal sound for what it is...I love this purchase. I highly recommend it!

1. This speaker is cheap (<$60).2. Very portable.3. Great sound volumn considering its size.4. It can provide some level of bass, which cannot be found on most of other speakers of this size.Overall, it's definitely worth the money.

I was at a place and a person had one and I was blown away at how loud it was and how good it sounded as some people that I know have a cheaper model and you can barely hear what they have and so I ended up ordering this one hoping it would sound just as good and so far I am not disappointed with the unit it is nice and clear and like someone said that it has a manual volume control which is great and the fact that it is blue tooth and so far it has paired up to everything that I have and so I love this little unit.

I think I could be called a semi or 3/4 audiophile type person. Probably would be a full fledged one if my budget accommodated that...The sound is full, - not lacking deep ends and loud without distorting. For amplifying a laptop I practically never needed to run both, that would be only in some big room with audience setup. Very happy, never though such a small thing could perform like that. It is like they managed to put the quality of a headphone into a loudspeaker.

let me start by saying that this little speaker rocks, the sound is incredible for such a small speaker unfortunately i believe i blew it by turning the volume on my ipod and my speaker all the way up because it's starting to make a weird noise but i guess that was my fault, the terrible thing was the seller, i paid extra for 2 day delivery and i didn't receive the speaker till 7 days later than expected i would advice anyone to buy the speaker at your local radioshack that way you will have it in your hands sooner
Of course this does not have the sound of a large speaker but it is pretty close. We took our larger Bose speaker traveling and it was a hassle. This is perfect for that.
summary: Small speaker with very good sound

reviewText: Easy to install via bluetooth (if you have other bluetooth products) I didn't need any instructions.  Plug into the computer via the mini usb for a quick charge.  Great sound and great look.

Purchased this to use with my iPad2 and iPhone4.  Setup is very simple...no issues. The speaker, though small (fits in the palm of your hand) has very good sound!  This would be super for a dorm room, small apartment, etc....no wires to deal with and is easy to take with you.  Really a great little speaker. I would buy this again.
summary: Big sound from a small device!

reviewText: I was pleasantly surprised with the sound from this Bluetooth speaker. It's hard to believe the bass, and the compact size just what I was looking for at a reasonable price. Glad I didn't let the price effect my decision.

I am addicted to small Bluetooth speakers, and am very critical of performance. This little guy not only packs a mean punch for its size, but delivers high- quality sound (JBL know not how to be less than magnificent) for a great price! Do not expect this guy to fill up a noisy room with lots of people,  but expect second to none sound in the bathroom, at a desk at home or office or camping, etc. I bring this one to work with me every day. It's portable, hold a descent charge, and automatically connects to my I- phone when I turn it on. GREAT GIFT, TOO!.
I would recommend to anyone who likes to have his/her music everywhere!It has great quality as for such small device.
This thing is perfect for my job. Gets good and loud with surprizingly good sound quality. I would absolutly recommend this product!
I bought this for my office, and love it.  It's got great sound clarity, and is discreet.  I'll likely buy more!
This little thing puts out a lot of sound.  Small enough to carry in your pocket and the bluetooth feature is great with my Ipod.  Comes in a bunch of colors.  I like it a lot and recommend it.
summary: Big Sound in a Small Round Package

reviewText: I like this because it is small and has a magnet on the back.  We got this for use in our classic cars.  I wanted something that would interface with the iPhone to play music while driving, but I also did not want to modify the car.  I gave this 4 stars only because it does not amplify the sound as much as I would have expected.  It works fine in every other respect  but the volume is just a little lower than I expected.  I would still recommend this to friends.

This bluetooth speaker was a pleasant surprise.  I was considering the Bose speaker but decided to give this a try because it was much more cost-effective.  I was so surprised by the clear and powerful sound of the speaker.  I liked it so much, I bought one for my husband too.  I carry it around with me to work too so it's very portable.  What a great speaker for the price.
The speaker is awsome in smaller  places. And yes the bass is superior to other speakers. I just wish that it was bigger
summary: And yes the bass is superior to other speakers

reviewText: I have a Kindle Fire HD and bought the JBL Micro Wireless Speaker to use with my KF HD when I just wanted to listen to music.  Unfortunately I was told it did't work with the Kindle Fire HD.  I called Amazon and they told me it wasn't compatible when I had trouble pairing the two. I noticed the JBL paired nicely with my Samsung Galaxy S3 however.  I got suspicious and called Amazon again.  This second tech told me to reset the KF HD to factory specs which I did.  The JBL now works fine and I love it. I have a HMDX Jam that I like but the shape makes it hard to find a place to set it down.  The JBL has a flat on the side so you can sit it down in an upright position and with the handle you can hang it up.
Very nice product and works flawlessly with my iphone and tablets. Has a powerful punch for being so small and is great for summer time cookouts and streaming music around the house.

Although this speaker is not the loudest, the clarity is awesome with this little speaker. Bluetooth works to about 20 feet in line of sight (phone to speaker). Love the option for hard wire with 3.5mm stereo jack. Great speaker, price could go down a bit though.

Perfect for enhancing GPS Volume via Cellphone in older,  classic cars with out built-in blue tooth. And great for mp3 audio or movies when wanting to listen aloud when your phone or tablet speakers just won't do!!! Size is perfect too. The Best by far!
summary: I knew I could bank on JBL to come through with quality performance and powerful sound!

reviewText: Easy set up, easy to pair, good battery life (I get over a week with usage a few hours a day) and great sound.  Not much more to say, neat little product, can't imagine anyone regretting the purchase.

Very respectable sound quality, full and crisp.  Almost has the bigger than life sound of a Bose system.  The range when connected to my iPhone (which linked up with zero effort)  is a good 30 feet which is way longer than I expected.  You'll be happy with this purchase if you want big sound in a small package for a reasonable price.
summary: Big sound, amazing range, great value

reviewText: Good sound quality for a small speaker.  I have the jbl flip which is awesome, but I wanted something smaller to bring on road trips or bike or walking around.
First let me start by saying it's not as big as you think it is . But with that being said. It is very very loud. Has great bass and is very clear. It makes my whole warehouse echo . Must get

Its does not compare to the Big Jambox (which I own too), but it sounds much better than any other mono speaker I've tested. The sound is well-balanced. Just the right amount of bass, highs, and mids. 5 hours of use may sound low, but it charges rather quick. I compared it to my iHome iHM60. The iHM60 is nothing compared to this one, in terms of sound quality. The JBL seems to be well-made, but it would have been nice if it was made out of metal like the Sharkk speaker. As long as I don't drop it on concrete I think it should be fine. The cool thing about the JBL is that I can charge it with my phone's charger. It has the same connection all phones (except iPhone) use these days. I plan to hang it around my neck when I ride my bike.
summary: Works really well for its size

reviewText: Theses speakers sound awesome.... For 50 bucks you won't get anything better... It is no Bose, in terms of sound but it is better than 99% of what is out there in the 50 dollars price range.

The other great thing about this receiver (besides great sound) is the possibility to use it as a Bluetooth receiver for non-Bluetooth systems.The connection to be used for chaining it to other speakers is both in and out. You can play your music from any Bluetooth enabled phone/tablet on your home theater. Just connect your speaker to the system using an audio cable.Good Bluetooth receivers can cost over 50 dollars. This one's free.
summary: Buy one speaker get one bluetooth receiver free

reviewText: My iPad cannot deliver enough sound that I can hear it when I am doing housework and other tasks. This was the answer. I can leave the iPad in one place and walk around with the speaker. I think the sound is more than decent for something this size.  Good if you want the iPad in a safer place but still want the speaker close by without risking your iPad, like in the kitchen or the bathroom.
summary: Sounds great for such a tiny thing

reviewText: We tote this thing all over the house.  My kids use it, I use it, and I like that I can let them listen to music without having to give them my tablet.

I purchased the JBL micro Bluetooth wireless speaker for our recent cruise to Alaska.  I thought it would be nice to listen to the music in my iPod while sitting on the balcony and looking out at the ocean.  I purchased this speaker right before the trip and did not have enough time to try it out in different environments.  I was a bit concerned that it might not be loud enough out on the balcony but I was wrong.  It put out awesome sound and was plenty loud.  Actually, I had to turn down the volume to low so it doesn't bother the neighbors around our suite.  I would highly recommend this speaker. Not only it sounds great but the price is very reasonable too.  You will not be disappointed.

This ultra portable bluetooth speaker has sound and fidelity that is truly unbelievable for anyone that requiressuch great portability.  The sound is rich and has great tone and bass sounds.  I highly recommend it for everyday useand for slipping it in the purse or attache case for traveling.

What a great little speaker this is. Perfect for us.  Great sound and love being able to adjust volume. We  notice best use is when using our tablet for a Netflix, volume was always too low.  NO MORE!  Fair price and compact to store.  Would certainly recommend.
summary: Perfect for my I Pod and my tablet

reviewText: I really like JBL Micro Wireless because they can make me very happy. I like JBL since I used this .

To be completely honest I wasn't expecting too much from this speaker, I just needed something to use while we were camping for the weekend. I was blown away by how loud and clear it was. This one speaker will beat any laptop speakers I've ever heard in loudness and clarity, it sounded great even when we were blasting edm, the bass not distorted at all. Furthermore, I only expected the battery to last a couple hours max, the battery ended up lasting about 8 hours with volume at ~70%. A friend of mine has a small solar powered battery charger for phones and such, I was able to charge the speaker back up in an hour or two and we got right back to it. I haven't tried the daisy chain feature because I only have the one but I will most likely be buying another one because this speaker is incredible and definitely worth the price.
summary: Big bumpin' from a little somethin'

reviewText: After reading countless reviews of travel speakers on numerous websites, I bought this little JBL speaker. For its size, it produces excellent sound. While it's not audiophile quality, it is far better than another small travel speaker I have. It works via both Bluetooth and a wired plug that you can insert into the earphone jack of an iPhone or iPad or similar device. I use it to listen to my music when in motel/hotel rooms and also to my favorite radio station on the Tunein app.

I wanted something small and portable that I could take with me on my travels and use in hotel rooms with my laptop and iPhone.  This works great for me!  Easy to set up the Bluetooth and place the speaker somewhere in the hotel room----the great sound from this JBL fills the room.  You can lay it down flat, stand it up, or hang/clip it somewhere.  Comes with a handy black cloth travel pouch and the charging cable.  Plus the wired plug-in cable wraps around the speaker and hides nicely when not in use.  I'm not a sound affectionado, but I think it sounds great.  I chose JBL because other products I have purchased from them are well built and have good sound. I love my wireless JBL and I'm happy with my purchase choice!
summary: Just What I Was Looking For!

reviewText: This is the best portable speaker we ever bought. The battery life is really good. The sound quality is extraordinary. The bluetooth range is also good but can be improved.
summary: This is the best portable speaker we ever bought

reviewText: i purchased this speaker after a friend showed me there Jambox. I like this speaker in almost every aspect of its design and functionality, it only has one button and a volume knob and I did not even have to use the directions to connect it to my droid. it sounds good has decent battery life if not up full blast the entire time you use it. bass is lacking and that is to be expected with a small one speaker unit of this type but makes enough bass for good sounding music and is surprisingly loud. overall I am happy with this product and since I wont use it al the time it works for my needs but I would say if you will use a device like this very often spend the extra  $60 and buy a two speaker unit like the Jambox.
summary: small easy to use and good value for the money

reviewText: Hard to believe some thing so small can deliver so much clear sound. They work upstairs, downstairs, inside and outside.

This little speaker is the king when it comes to battery life.  I've easily gotten 11 hours of continuous use on a full charge, even using Bluetooth connectivity.  Very compact, so it's highly portable, and the built-in audio connection stores away neatly by wrapping around the speaker.  I am concerned by the fact that the cable is not replaceable, but I use Bluetooth 95% of the time, so it's probably a non-issue.  Sound quality is great for such a small unit.

It's a great little speaker that puts out clear, quality sound!  Speaker is easy to set up, and the instructions are idiot proof.  I was also impressed with the battery life of the speaker as well!  Great product!

Bought this and a Cambridge Oontz at the same time mainly to have a couple of Bluetooth speakers for playing music in and around the house.  Both products were in the $35-50 range and expected the JBL to be the lesser of the two products mainly because of the size and some of the scaled down attributes (sans speaker phone mode).  Once I got both going I was very pleased with the JBL.  It has great sound for such a small device and far exceeded my expectations.  The Oontz is great too.  But had a little more expectations for that one.I highly recommend if you are looking for a high fidelity cheaper Bluetooth speaker.  I will order a few more of these to give to my son, nephews/nieces and such (probably keep another one for me for my office).
great sound out of such a little package.

I can't believe the sound from this small but powerful speaker. I am a working musician and know the JBL quality in P.A. gear and that is why I bought it for my daughter's iphone. Great product at an affordable price.

Ok, the sound is not the greatest.  It's pretty good though.  I've used it as a wireless speaker for both ipad and iphone, and I love how simple this is to use.  First time pairing is simple, and then all you need to do is turn it on and your ipad/iphone will automatically look for it and route sound to me.I like the portability of this as well.  Just put it in your jacket pocket and you're good to go.

Get this speaker... The only thing that I would like is if you could be a little farther from the speaker before it starts cutting out....  Great sound.  I also didn't realize how tiny this speaker was from the pictures.  It's about the size of the palm of your hand.

Before buying I didn't expect this small speaker can produce strong hi/low frequencies. With one charge it stays much longer than the time mentioned in product details. Much worth buying this product, highly recommended.
for such a small speaker!  I have enjoyed it very much.  It is easy to carry to various rooms in the house while working or even outside for the patio!

Great sound for the small size. Very portable. Easy to recharge. Perfect for a small room (perfect for the operating room). It could have better bass sound, but the next step would be the mini soundlink Bosé speaker, but it is three times moré expensive. Great speaker for the price
This is a quality product. The speaker is perfect for gatherings. It's small enough to fit in your pocket too. Very nice!

I use this with my LG Optimus G over Bluetooth and it sounds great.  I'm impressed with the sonic range.  I'd like for it to be louder (it should go to 11), but for a rechargeable little device, the volume is still impressive.

I have an Altec Lansing of about the same size (takes 3 AAA batteries with a cord) - wanted this JBL as it has Bluetooth and built in battery (i.e. more convenient).  The thing is slightly smaller than the Altec Lansing, but sounds MUCH better.  In fact the bass on this is really good for the small size, Bluetooth connectivity is solid (I have an Asus Infinity that I mainly use this from).  LOVE the fact that it also has an out so it's like having a wireless dongle.  I can't recommend this enough!
summary: Bought to replace my Altec Lansing of similar size

reviewText: This thing is fantastic.  I tried several other models and brands and found that this speaker really compares nicely.  The loop on the top makes it easy to hook it through straps or to a stroller.  It plays well 20-30 feet away from my iPhone and pairing was very simple.  You can easily control the volume from the speaker or from your device and it really sounds great.  The battery lasts forever.  Hadn't used it in a while and the battery hasn't lost any charge in storage.  Fits easily into a pocket!

I would definitely recommend this for anyone who wants to take their music with them. This thing brings the noise! The sound is amazing and i can easily get a 60ft range from the bluetooth. It also conveniently fits in my cargo pockets or clips to my pack. Definitely worth it's small price.

I bought this because my car stereo only plays am/fm and it's not worth it to me to change it out. This little speaker fits in the cup holder perfectly and delivers GREAT sound. It plays louder than any road noise and has a great bass return. I could not be happier with this.The sounds quality is just outstanding. It pairs with my iphone bluetooth and charges with a USB. I have it plugged right into my dual lighter charger. One slot for iphone the other for the speaker. It also has a hard wire via the headphone jack which I recommend if you're playing it in close proximity of your phone just for battery life purposes. In my home I can go a couple rooms away with my phone and not interrupt the speaker play at all. You won't be sorry with this purchase.

This is very easy to pair up and I love that I can leave my iphone or ipad in one place and move the speaker around with me wherever I go.  It has a good range and sounds fantastic.  I like that you can add on other speakers to it even if they are a different brand.  I gave it 4 stars because I wish it was a little louder (I like loud music).  But all-in-all, I'd say it is a great little sounding speaker!!

I just received my speaker today.  I charged it for a couple of hours. It connected to my IPhone in seconds. For a speaker of this size the sound is awesome. I can't wait to go sit on my sundeck tomorrow and listen to it as I watch my grandkids.

I use this tiny speaker everywhere and people is surprised when they listen the sound. I use it even in my car while driving because I have a very old radio and the jbl sounds better than my car speakers. Moreover it has a rubber base so it doesn't slip when I am driving a bit faster. I definitely recommend it if you are looking for the best sound in a tiny speaker.

I rate this as five stars not because it is the best speaker out there, but for the money I doubt you will find anything better. In my opinion it outplays the Mini Jambox which cost significantly more.The speaker has a small footprint but large sound and decent bass. It can distort (as any speaker does) when pushed to it's volume limits. However, going the limit is not required. I took this out to the golf course and it rode along and performed great for the entire afternoon. Bluetooth pairing with my iPhone 5 took only seconds. I received this as a gift (from my wish list) and I could not be more pleased.

As a very satisfied owner of an almost antique JBL bookshelf speaker system and a mp3 docking station I can attest to the company's overall craftsmanship. I've even owned an outdoor setup circa 1990s, that held its own until a tree limb took it out of business. The company has had a good run with products that I've purchased. So when I picked up this bluetooth speaker I knew what kind of quality this gear brings to the table. I bought several of these as Christmas gifts in different colors. Everyone loves them.Out of the box this speaker is impressive. I like the overall feel and balance. Measuring in at about 3"W x almost 2"H, it weighs in at a little over 4 ounces. The speaker kit is packed with a 36" micro USB charging cable, storage pouch, warranty card, and instructions. Even though its doesn't take a degree in rocket science to start this puppy up, the company loses points for its ho hum instructions. The body is outfitted with a handle for mounting a lanyard or carabiner. I opted to add a nylon lanyard. I picked up a protective storage case and dumped the storage pouch.After a quick two hour charge, I first connected this puppy to my mp3 player. No problems. Afterwards I tried this speaker out with my Galaxy 3. Again, no problems. The power button is located on the side. With 3 watts of power, this model is not going to be accused of shaking the paint off the walls. No matter what I had connected, this model delivered my tunes with clear, crisp highs and a nice rich bass. Unlike other gear that I've used in the past, I got zero distortion.As advertised, I got almost a full five hours before it was time to recharge. When fully juiced a bright blue light illuminates at the 12 o'clock position on the front of the unit. It grows paler after a few hours of use. When you see red its time to recharge. I'm glad the company went with a built in Li ion battery. Volume is dial controlled. Piggybacking an additional speaker via the speaker port was easy and gave me a solid stereo. The rubber no slide grip is a great ad on.Overall I'm quite pleased with this JBL speaker. I even like the speaker more then I thought I would. It is a reliable product that delivers quality sound when and where I want it. That's good enough for me.
Surprising sound balance from such a small speaker. Bluetooth connection is flawless every time.  Holds it's charge for hours.  I bought another one as a gift.
I bought this speaker because i found my ipad to not be loud enough and needed a external speaker to prolong my ipad air speaker. Buy it! You wont be dissapointed.
Great size, price, and sound!  Everyone who hears this speaker wants to know how much is it and where can I get one!
Has good sound and was very easy to link up via bluetooth with my iphone 5.  I use it when I run on the treadmill or am lifting weights.
Best speaker I have heard for a Bluetooth, great bass and great highs really impressed my friends at the beach, which is reason I bought it.
Overwhelming sound for a little inexpensive speaker. Fantastic on the beach. Love the hockey puck size and it it very light in weight

I go a little crazy looking at the reviews on some items here trying to sort through good/bad. This little speaker looked like a winner and I agree. It has great sound and has worked flawlessly since day one.
summary: Read the reviews here and finally purchased

reviewText: I know that its s micro but it is not loud. Had to hold it so close to my ear. Its not bad if u are standing right on top of it.

This speaker works great. It is quite small but has great sound. Syncs up to bluetooth on my android phone quickly and easily. I wish I got the newer model as it is cheaper and you can connect more than one of these badboys together for "surround" sound.Great for outside/inside whatever.Wish the little clip actually opened up like a caribener.The battery life is pretty damn good. I don't think it came with a charging cable fyi.

The built in loop is terrific for on the go, when attaching to a belt loop with a carabiner. Definitely five stars for portable functionality and all-around design. Ease of use is also five stars. It seems to come on automatically when blue-tooth is available. I haven't had the battery go dead yet.As for sound quality I can compare it to the Jawbone Jambox Mini. The JJ Mini had clearer, sharper audio to my ear. But lacked bass and overall what I call blast, loudness or sound projection. For intended portable use overall the JBL was a clear winner.I did not try daisy chaining(DC) two JJ Mini's together. But I did DC the JJ Mini and the JBL. Here the JBL again was louder compared to the DC JJ Mini in this configuration.The most pleasant surprise was DCing a JBL with Bluetooth, to the same JBL without Bluetooth. They work together marvelously and saved me around $20.00 in not having to have two of these, both with Bluetooth. Since the combination works so well together, combined with the JBL's functionality, is like having a mini jukebox that can utilize my Smartphone or Ipod for source in my pocket. (I don't like headphones or earbuds.) Like Robert Klein's old 70's comedy routine, "Every Record Ever Recorded, Three Tractor Trailers full, driven to your door, for only a dollar a week." Now every record and every station is in my pocket with a sound system to boot.
Purchased this for my son for Christmas.  Was amazed at the sound this thing produces.  Good buy. Easy to take with you given the size.

Incredible speaker for the money. Anyone who I've used it around has asked where I got it and plans on getting their own. Easy to use, small, light, sturdy. The sound can get pretty loud and is very crisp and clear. I would highly recommend.

It works beautifully with my iphone and the sound is good and loud enough to fill a small-medium room but having couple of issues.1. After I drained the battery, I had a hard time charging it.  I had it plugged into my laptop for hours but the red light wouldn't stay on (to show it's charging) and it wouldn't turn on.  And then at some point at the end of the day I tried to turn it on again and the blue light came on indicating that it's on.  So not not sure happened.  Will have to drain and recharge to see if it happens again.  If so, they tell me they will need to replace ith b/c it's defective.2. I can't seem to get it to connect with my pc.  This could be a user error or my pc.  But my pc is only a year old so I'm thinking it should work seamlessly so not sure what's going on.Will update the review when I get these issues figured out.
summary: Beautiful sound but having recharging issues and issue connecting to my pc.

reviewText: for a reasonable price of $50....very good sound and decent bass.  Had no problem connecting my phone via bluetooth.  Avid amazon buyer and definitely recommend this item

Got this for my teen daughter for Christmas- we ALL loved it- we used it for the rest of the day. The sound quality is excellent. Don't know what those other people are talking about "distortion", "hard to hook up", my teen was using it within a couple minutes of opening it! Highly recommend this- it sounds awesome- you will be pleased with this purchase. It also comes with a small drawstring pouch to protect it from scratches when you take it places- and you WILL take it places- this thing is pretty much with my daughter during all of her waking hours- she even takes it to work after school.
summary: Great little speaker! You will love this!

reviewText: Excellent value for the price, very convenient little speaker that is perfect for working out or bringing on vacation.  This will come in handy for many different occasions.

This speaker is one of the best ones i've ever used.  Bluetooth is easy to get paired, and works with Android or IOS devices.  If you have a little extra to spend, and quality is a concern, you cannot go wrong with this speaker!

Smaller than I expected but with a bigger sound and good bass.  I mean it's not a subwoofer or anything but a dang sight better than my iPhone built in speakers.  Super portable. Battery life is good.

I think for its size, its perfect. There's really not much more I could realistically ask for.Great battery life, great, loud sound, surprising amount of bass, given its size. Pairs up flawlessly with my phone. And the manual volume dial is great - not everything is better in digital form. The analog dial allows for fast adjustment of volume, rather than  '+' or '-' buttons you have to continuously press to get the volume to change, and whose settings might get cleared out. With the analog volume dial, you are guaranteed to have the volume you left it at, and have a much more convenient and fast way to change the volume.
summary: Perfect wireless speaker for its size.

reviewText: I use this speaker for cookouts, or when just sitting on the deck...  any situation where adding music without a hassle would come into play.  The sound is very good for its size, and virtually everyone who sees and hears it wants to get one.  I haven't had it for a very long time, so I can't say anything about its durability, but with most electronics, if it works out of the box and you don't drop it or anything, it will usually work for a long time.
summary: Works as expected, with excellent sound for a speaker of that size.

reviewText: My daughter had one if these. I loved it so much I bought one for me. It has great sound and tucks away in a drawer when I'm not using it. This has great sound. I love it.

I was in a electronic store at the airport looking for a wireless speaker for my phone. when a lady pulled me to the side and suggested I check out the JBL Wireless Ultra-Portable Speaker on Amazon for about $60!  She purchased one based on a friends' recommendation, and she instantly fell in love with the quality of sound.  She also pointed out that this little gem had over 700 reviews with a rating of 4.9 out of 5 stars.  So after reading several of the reviews, I decided I'd try it out.  Within two days of placing the order, my speaker arrived on my doorstep, and in less than a minute, I paired the speaker to my phone and started enjoying beautiful, rich quality sound from incredible piece of pint size technology!  I LOVE IT!  I already know as soon as my 18 year old son comes out of his room and hears this sound from this little baby, he's going to try and confiscate my speaker.  Oh, but I've got news for him.  He will just have to wait until Friday, because that's when he will get his.  Yep, as soon as I finish this review, I'm ordering one for him and one for my husband as well! :-)
summary: What in the World could be better for the price!

reviewText: Great item fun to use with iPad and iPod. I think I might just buy another one the price was so reasonable.
Performs as expected. The battery life is good and the range is good also. This is no replacement for home system but it fits in your pocket.

The portable speaker  you need. Loud, crisp sound from a high quality speaker. Conveniently charges with your android charger. I bought 2 but linking them doesn't make the sound noticeably better. Still, when the first one croaks from abuse, I've got a spare and it's worth it.
summary: I bought 2 but linking them doesn't make the sound noticeably better. Still

reviewText: Built sturdy syncs up without need of password. Battery good love that stereo cable is built into it great design, very loud but not staticy you can trust jbl for audio, IT is bigger than your palm inwish I could have seen it next to a phone. I don't like that the usb mini is proprietary I wish it just fit any usb mini
perfect sound .. not too loud as to disturb neighbors , perfect to enjoy in backyard with a glass of wine

This little bt speaker puts out very good sound for a product of its size. The battery lasts longer than the 5 hours that the manufacturer advertises. It is easy to use. I also like the little loop on top, as I use it with a small carabineer to clip onto my clothes or backpack. It also recharges rapidly. Also, the connectivity distance on the Bluetooth surprised me. I had it playing  and without thinking, I walked away, appx 30 feet into another room, and then the music slowly faded away, making me realize that it was connected via Bluetooth.
summary: Good things come in small packages.

reviewText: Awesome sound for a small speaker. I use it with my droid incredible 4g LTE. sound is great for a small device

The day this speaker I ordered arrived, I immediately opened the package and tried it out.  It was very easy to link it to my iPhone using Bluetooth.  The instant the music started I was stunned!  What an amazing little speaker.  I plan on bringing it everywhere with me when I travel.  It is light and portable.  It was so worth the price I paid for it.
Awesome sound and great battery life. Used it at the beach all week! Thinking about getting another one to link together.
Pairs very easily with my iPhone, iPad, and any other bluetooth device that I have tried.  Big sound for the size.

This speaker easily connected to my Blue Tooth and the sound was 'okay', it is good if it's facing you but if it's sitting flat it's not the best. You can't stand it up, it has to hang on something if you want it facing you. But, the real issue is that it bonked out after 30-40 minutes of use and never came back to life. So annoying to have to go through the return process and wait to be refunded and make a trip to UPS to send it back. Save your money and time and don't buy this speaker.
I travel quite a bit and bought this speaker for the road. It fills the room (and more), has crystal clear sound and excellent base. One of the best purchases I've made lately.

love the sounds,  volume is reasonable, decent bass response, and love the bluetooth.  I sometimes set it on the fridge and it provides perfect sound for the kitchen while cooking and entertaining.  Love that I can also connect it to my daughters globe/dance ball with speakers.  Then we have  louder, not really better sound, but still get the bass response from the JBL and enjoy the synced light show too.  I own other JBL speakers EONS, and have used various JBL products over the past 30+ years playing in bands.  They just make good quality products.  Sound is always good, and the build is very durable.....  My wife rolled her eyes and said another stupid purchase.  Honestly she uses it more than me and admitted she loves it.

I was surprised how sturdy it is, despite its small size.It has a very powerful sound, I use it with my macbook and ipad mini.the sound is quite clear and the bass sound good.Comes with a small bag to transport, nice touch.
I bought this speaker about a month ago and so far it has worked just as I was hoping it would and some!!

reviewText: We took this on a trip and loved the compact size and the great sound. We listened to our favorite music while cycling through Germany!

It paired up instantly.  The sound quality is great and even surprised my college age son who has a much more expensive speaker system.  I take it everywhere.... to parties, beach, pool, and even traveling.  I use it on my own patio for parties and in my gym when I'm working out. Don't get me wrong its sound is clear, and loud enough for most people.  At the highest level you definitely get good volume but I could stand it to go a little bit higher.

reviewText: With the JBL Micro I can actually hear my music and movies on my Kindle Fire HD at an enjoyable level.  Well worth the price and it exceeded my expectations in every way.  The wireless aspect makes it that much better.  Easy set-up.  Highly recommend.

reviewText: I take this with me on trips, and it makes whatever space I am in feel like home.  I like the portable size and great sound quality.

Great sound. My boys really like it. I actually bought one and then they would fight over who was going to use it so I bought another!!!!

The seller was very, very good I and would buy from them again.

Its small but sounds big. Sounds much better than our previous and much larger one. Perfect for out on the patio. Now curious to see what two would sound like daisy chained. For the $ why not. I cant think of a single bad thing to say about this little thing

Thanks to the guy that reviewed and compared some other speakers! (under JBL micro wireless reviews).I'm rating this speaker by the bass, loudness, quality of the sound and how portable it is!BUY IT!!! YOU'LL NEVER REGRET IT!

This was exactly what I was looking for. I was looking for portable bluetooth speakers to use with my ASUS Transformer TF101 as well as my Galaxy Note 2 that was small enough to fit in my laptop bag that I use to carry my tablet around in. I use my tablet everyday for work as well as school and I watch a lot of movies on it and play a lot of music. I was very surprised as others have stated on how loud this little thing is. I have an older docking station that I have been using (Logitech Pure-Fi) and this one speaker is louder than all 4 of those speakers that are on it. I am impressed by this product so much that I will be buying another one of these speakers this Friday to add to this one. I would recommend this product to anyone that is looking for something like this.

I finally hit it out of the park with this baby!  Men can be so hard to shop for but my husband loves this.  He carries it with him everywhere.  Especially in the mornings - just puts it in his bathrobe pocket.  Sound is fabulous.  I purchased this speaker and and the SimplyVibe V3-5CPB Bluetooth Mini Ultra so we could compare.  The sound on this one was definitely richer, with great bass and much less distortion at higher volumes.  The one thing we liked better about the Simply Vibe was the skip forward or backward selection control on the speaker.  With the blue tooth it's easy to get separated from your iPad or iPhone so it's nice to be able to have some control from the speaker, but for sound, this one was the winner.  Great for back yard dinner parties, around the house use and travel!  The little handle makes it hangable, too.  We love it!

I first purchased another Bluetooth speaker which was terrible compared to this. The JBL puts out the highs, mids, and lows with incredible accuracy for its size. I originally purchased this to listen to music on the beach. I was apprehensive at first as I was not sure if this would be loud enough to drown out the sound of the ocean, which it is. I have been using it everywhere since I got back from the beach. The sound is much better then what is produced by my Macbook Pro built in speakers so I am using it more often then I thought I would. It connects to many devices so my friends are always connecting to it when they come over. It is a very portable useful device that you will like and will never return.

We bought the HMDX Audio HX-P230GY JAM Classic Bluetooth Wireless Speaker (Grey) and were fairly disappointed. So I read reviews closer this time and chose this JBL. Smaller than expected, but it has a great sound so size doesn't matter here. I like the hook/loop at the top to hang.It seems to have a great range and we haven't had any connection issues like we did with the Jam speaker. The battery life is longer as well. Good purchase.
I recommend this product, so easy to carry, use and charge. Perfect for the beach and even for the house. It is really loud for the size that it is.
Nice sound. Not as loud as I would like, but I doubt any wireless speaker would be.  Clear.  Crisp.  Plug in is a nice feature.  Very portable.  I'd buy it again.
I purchased this to give as a present to my husband and he was totally satisfied. Now both my teenagers want their own.
summary: Great little item and value for money!

reviewText: I got this speaker for my Mother for Mother's Day. She listens to a lot of music at work and was looking for something other then her phone or ear buds. After doing some looking around online I found this speaker and decided to buy it for her.I gave it to her early because I knew she'd be able to use it and I bought it so she could, so why not just give it to her as an early present?The packaging is really simplistic, as well as the instruction manual. To be honest I actually feel the instructions may actually be TOO SIMPLE and can lead to frustration if you can't get it working properly.I had no issues pairing the bluetooth connection up to my iPhone 5, but when it came to pairing up the speaker with my Mother's Samsung Galaxy S4, it took some trial and error to get the speaker to work. The phone was complaining that the speaker didn't have the right pass code, the speaker apparently thought it was connected, but no sound came out.After messing with the phone and the speaker for awhile I finally got it to connect and work. Let me start off by saying this speaker really puts out the volume! Not only is it loud and sound excellent, but the base on such a small speaker is amazing. I was really impressed.There is a volume toggle on the side of the speaker so you can manually turn the sound up and down. The package claims it has a battery life of about 5 hours.I guess if I had any kind of complaint, it would be that the speaker isn't 100% compatible with apps and that's not really their fault, it's more of a Android issue. One of the music programs my Mother uses, refuses to run unless there is something directly plugged into the headphone jack (it will NOT recognize bluetooth devices.) Another App she uses for a radio (not Pandora) and the sound just doesn't come out.Besides that, this is a great device and I may end up picking up one for myself in the future.

Nice Little speaker with great sound qualityPros- 3.5 MM audio cable readily available- Bulethooth ready- Great sound- Can make sound for atleast 4 hrs with full charge- Pocket size speaker can fit in any whereConsAs of now none
The sound is wonderful for such a small speaker.  It works perfectly with my iPhone 5.  I highly recommend it!

I like to listen to my own music in the hotel room, but I hate the sound of iPhone/iPad built-in speakers.  Therefore, I try to find a bluetooth speaker good that is good for traveling.  I have few criteria on this speaker.  The sound must be reasonable fine with compact size and light weight.  It seems like a mission impossible because there is no such speaker will provide good sound with light weight, so I aimed for the small size criterion first.  I saw this speaker with lots of good reviews in my amazon search.  Okay, I just gave it a try.  The moment I unboxed it, I am impressed by the weight (the size is good too, but I knew how big was it by the description).  It is very light.  Then, I paired it with my iPad.  The sound is greater than I expect.  It is not perfect, but it is much better than I thought.  I really do not know how to describe it, but it is not bad at all.  The only thing I can complain is mono, but for some reasons, it does not bother me at all.  Last but not least, the price is affordable.
summary: I am impressed by the sound, size, weight, and price

reviewText: Bought this for my dad for Xmas, and he was impressed by the sound quality; it could use a little better bass, but for the price and size, it's great. It was very easy to set up and use. My dad's going to be able to joy his music on his deck outside!

Since my car stereo system got stolen I've just been using portable speakers, so I can bring them in and out of the car. I've had a few Bluetooth speakers over the last couples years, all of which ran out of battery quite quickly, had poor sound quality, or didn't go loud enough. I like listening to music at a fairly loud volume, and I listen to some music with pretty strong baselines, so I always had trouble finding a good speaker. My last speaker was always at its highest volume and the base sounded a bit staticky, but I figured it wouldn't get much better with a compact speaker.When the last one broke I grabbed this one at Target, charged it with the USB on my computer and powered it up. Bluetooth pairup was easy and intuitive. Imagine my surprise when I turned it on and the sound quality was incredible, better than any other speaker I've owned. I wanted to see how loud it could go and turned it up and eventually had to stop cause it got so loud, still with amazing sound quality. It comes with a cute little carrying bag and a clip on the top, and fits easily in my purse.I've used it so far every day for 5 days for at least an hour and haven't had to recharge yet. I now use it at home because the speaker is even better than my computer's speakers. It even passed what I like to call the "Drunk in Love" test, because that baseline sounded perfect! I always figured I had to choose between compact size, good sound quality and high volume, but this little device has proved me wrong. I'd recommend this to everyone and plan to buy my mother one for Mother's Day this year :).
This JBL speaker unleashes amazing clear music at a high volume.I'm surprised at how well this speaker works. Will be using on the beach and outdoors all summer.
AMAZING PRODUCT. I USE IT ALMOST EVERY DAY. GREAT SOUND!

I was really impressed by the quality of the sound that came out of this little speaker.  It is only about the size of the palm of my hand, which makes it easy to use anywhere, and puts out good clear sound. This one was a gift and I plan to buy myself one too.
summary: Great sound in a small package!

reviewText: I can't charge it...I bought this for my bf because he lost the one he had previosuly received as a gift except it has no charger so he hasn't even been able to use it. :(

I love the sound of this small speaker. It is incredible. But the Bluetooth doesn't work properly. I thought it was my laptop, but tried on my husband's and others and still takes sometime to be found... sometimes it is not found at all, which is a pity.
summary: Great sounds, but bluetooth doesn't work perfectly

reviewText: I was very surprised when I opened this package I expecting the speaker to be a little larger, like the size of a CD. I reluctantly plugged it into my phone to play so music I was convinced that the sound was going to be lacking. Boy was a I surprised and delighted by the power and clarity of this little guy. Best personal little speaker for the beach or travel, and great size to tuck away and light to carry.
Purchased for my hubby and he truly loves it!  The sound quality is great!!!!  Would definitely recommend it to everyon.
This little speaker provides great sound quality for the size and price. The only drawback for me is the length of the cable provided. Otherwise I'm very pleased.
Truly a great speaker and the sound is quite amazing from such a small apparatus.  Great for our purposes....even playing golf!
The JBL speaker is compact but it features good sound quality. It's easy to carry without sacrificing performance. I would highly recommend this wireless speaker for the price.

Make no mistake, you are just paying for the famous "JBL" name brand.That's all...It sounds just a bit better than a speaker phone ( no bass at all ).It should not cost more than $20 box ...I gave it 2 starts just because of the nice design!

I really love this little speaker. I use it at work but I am sure I will use it while gardening and entertaining.  The sound is excellent. It sounds like a big boom box. The quality is also excellent.  JBL really made a great little speaker.
This is a great product.  Great sound, battery lasts a long time, and great price.

I have over 20 portable speakers.  My best one is a Minirig (Available on Amazon.uk), but this is my go-too speaker due to the small size, light weight, and extremely good sound.  I pair it with my Samsung Note 8.0, phone, ipad, and mp3 player.

IMO these JBLs are surprisingly accurate and spacial from the midrange on up. I like these speakers a lot, but I am surprised to see JBL describing them as having surprisingly strong bass.I have JBL HT speakers, so nothing against JBL, but I these are not speakers that reproduce bass in what would be described as strong or powerful, in fact it is their greatest weakness. The bass is there; it's just not strong, but in spite of that, these speakers grew on me over time.Overall I think these little speakers are as good as is possible considering the limitations of size but every speaker has it's tradeoffs--this one is super portable and sounds nice but not as full a sound as I would like.The bluetooth range on these JBL speakers outside is approximately 90'. While they will sit upright, stability is poor. I used them for probably 6 hours and never recharged them. Volume is OK for me outside (I have neighbors) and just about what you would expect from this size speaker, but that's a relative thing. The priced dropped $10 after I received mine and surprisingly Amazon does not have a price guarantee. The lower price is a good thing, however.The bottom line: If the small size is important to you, these are recommended. If you could use a larger size, I would look elsewhere.I will sacrifice some portability for a more balanced sound. The speakers I want will be used primarily on my patio.  I returned my JBL Micro and I am rethinking what I want in a rechargeable, portable, bluetooth speaker. I'm not sure that I can find what I want in this size. I am now looking at Creative D100 and D200 and similar speakers.  But, heck, if I find that I need speakers in this size, I'll reconsider these!
summary: Bright, accurate, and the sound grows on you

reviewText: Very pleased with this little wonder in red, although any color would have been fine.  For its size it has big volume. Absolutely LOVE this little speaker...the sound is amazing for something so small...I take it to work for my office & listen to Iheart radio...love love love it...3 others that I work with have also purchased it...

I was looking for a new speaker and i love it!! Easy to charge and connect the Bluetooth to me phone

reviewText: I have been thru several wireless and non wireless speakers offered here on Amazon, searching for something with acceptable sound and portability.  I have found it in the JBL micro wireless hockey puck.  Don't let the lack of stereo put you off; the sound is very, very good and it literally fits in your pocket.  I don't use the included wired connection for non- Bluetooth connectivity and so cannot speak to that but the Bluetooth connectivity is fast and solid and I really appreciate the fact you can adjust the volume both at the source and on the speaker as well.I credit my dad with teaching me appreciation of good music and I think so highly of this little marvel that I am planning on giving one to my dad for his birthday in July.  Now that is saying something.
summary: Finally found an excellent portable wireless speaker

reviewText: I bought this to used with my ipad and watch movies or listen to music. It's a terrific sounding little speaker with a lot of power and decent bass sound for something of this size and price.

Such an awesome sound. Big and with a nice bass fullness. I love this little speaker. However….sigh…after just six months of very conservative usage it just stopped. So I sent it back and ordered a new one so I would have two.The new one arrived and works great but the one that was replaced arrived with a faulty button. As I said the sound  is wonderful, however the durability issue is concerning.  So far two out of three have had problems.Gamble at your own risk.

reviewText: Love this little guy. .. its the three perfect replacement for for the flips audio that got damaged by accident and the boomphones that went out on me after 3weeks. I like listening to music of loud especially since I bike a lot m..I bought the micro II aswell just so I could have a set of speakers to attach to my bike and ride to some toons!!!

I love, love, love this speaker. I'm going to buy a second one because I love it so much.It was smaller than I'd imagine it would be, so I was afraid the sound quality would suffer. reviewText: Speaker does a great job of projecting sound with clarity.  Great for the price and compact for carrying on trips.

Expected clear sound being a JBL product, but all I can say is wow.it is the loudest speaker in its size I've heard so far.I own a lot of portable speakers jbl,beats, monster and this is my new favorite for personal use.Love it.UPDATE just found something new out,you can plug cable in auxiliary in car that offers it and no bluetooth and now you have bluetooth in car cool feature not too many people know about.
The quality of the sound is great! My husband asked why I didn't get him one too. I will get him one for Xmas.

Amazing sound from such a small, lightweight  device. Includes a nicely hidden, approximately 12" cable, terminated with a gold plated 3.5mm phone plug that mates with most headphone jacks. Most people will connect through the Bluetooth interface. The bottom has a non-slip surface that also minimizes "rattle" against the surface where this unit resides.Fully Windows 8 compliant and only takes a few minutes to get installed and going. It automatically connects to my PC whenever I turn on the speaker. Press the "ON" button, a blue LED turns on, wait a couple of seconds for a beep and you are connected and ready to operate. Fantastic!Comes with a mini USB to USB cable that allows charging from a USB port or a cheap USB power adapter available elsewhere. Also, included is a cloth case with draw-string for closing. This is adequate for storage.Includes a hanger. Connect to a strap around your neck while grilling.JBL deserves every one of the 5-star rating. I wish that I could give them more.
